questions.question: Who is the author of the novel?
The story is written from the perspective of 3 characters – who are these 3 characters?
Where is the story set?
Who is Lucy’s mentor/boss who works as a glassblower?
Who is Ed’s former boss and what happened to him?
What is a sheddy and why are they called this?

choices.answer: Someone who works in a shed
Someone who ditches class and hangs out by the sheds
Someone who builds sheds for a living

questions.question: Why does Lucy’s dad decide to live in the shed?

choices.answer: He and Lucy's mother need time to write

questions.question: What are the names of the friends that accompany Lucy and Ed throughout the novel?

choices.answer: Jack and Malcolm, Jazz and Daisy
Bert and Al, Jazz and Daisy
Leo and Jake, Jazz and Daisy
Leo and Dylan, Jazz and Daisy

questions.question: Why does Ed take the job with Leo and his brother Jake?

choices.answer: He has nothing else to do
To help his mother pay rent

questions.question: Who do Ed and Leo describe as ‘crazy’ because they once ate cockroaches for a dare?
Why did Lucy and Ed’s first date end in him getting punched?

choices.answer: Ed said something mean about her parents
Ed said he preferred a prettier girl than Lucy

questions.question: What’s Daisy’s ‘special way’ of getting the truth out of Dylan?
Why do Ed and Leo keep their identities a secret?

choices.answer: To avoid getting picked up by the police
Because their work is art for art's sake

questions.question: Why did Ed leave school and why doesn’t he like telling people?

choices.answer: Was caught cheating and is embarrassed he can't read/write
He was caught by the police at school

questions.question: Who is Ed’s former girlfriend and why are they no longer together?

choices.answer: Emma - broke up because Ed didn't think he was good enough
Beth - broke up because Ed didn't think he was good enough

questions.question: What do Lucy and Ed do at the party that helps them feel more comfortable around one another?

choices.answer: They have a few drinks to unwind
Ed covers their eyesand they feel like different people
They bond over their mutual hatred for one of their peers

questions.question: Who does Leo live with and why?

choices.answer: Lives with his grandmother - hisparents were often fighting
Lives with his grandmother - parents abandoned him
Lives with his grandmother - she kidnapped him
Lives with his grandfather - his parents were often fighting

questions.question: Why do the boys go to the party?

choices.answer: To meet with Jake andget details on the van to pick up
To meet with Jake and ditch the girls
To get drunk and have fun

questions.question: Even after Ed starts to get along with Lucy, why doesn’t he tell her that he is Shadow?

choices.answer: He thinks that she'll feel betrayed
He doesn't want to get her involved in the robbery
He doesn’t believe he’ll live up to the imageshe has of him.

questions.question: Who’s the first person that Lucy suspects of being Shadow?
